full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB LUGS GNYIS RGYUN 'KHYER SNYING PO BCUD BSDU 'DUS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(DE LTAR RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI, RGYUN 'KHYER SHIN TU MDOR BSDUS PA, GSAR SNYING LUGS SROL MA 'DRES PAR, TSIGS SU BCAD PAR SDEBS PA 'DI, ,SMOS LDAN DGA' YIS NAN TAN DU, ,BSKUL NGOR DHARMA BADZRA GYIS, ,GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU 'PHAR BA'I LO, ,SA GA'I NYA LA SBYAR BA DGE , ,,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
